editorialSummary.text: Chain retailer with a large array of brand-name electronics, computers, appliances & more.

originalText.text: Always good customer service and good geek advice for the average mortal and lesser informed. Thank you TEO, for listening and solving the issue with understanding and patience.  I see promotions in your future. And thank you George for perfect fast customer service in my second price match.

originalText.text: This is one of my favorite West Elm stores it's in New York City just above Columbus circle and it's a beautiful view of the circle once you get up to the second floor and look out for the window and excellent setup of bedroom living room mirrors bedding dishware or I'm sorry dinnerware glasses anything that you can think of that you would need in your apartment can be found. I took several pictures of the Jensen's desk which is a glass desk with planks underneath there which I was thinking of getting so I'm sorry if you were any day with those pictures but it gives you an idea of the quality of the merchandise that exists in West Elm.   my friend Fernando came with me he loves West Elm  him too and this was his first experience visiting a West  Elm store in New York City and you can tell by the expression on his face how  Happy he wants to be at West Elm on Broadway.I'm just a little advised if you're not from the city you can walk out of West Town go back down to Columbus circle which is a 5 minute walk and make a left and can go right into the park and enjoy some quiet time before you go on to your other journeys in the city

originalText.text: Asked for help to get a product, girl by door said she would get us helped waited for over 15 min, no one showed up. When asked for help a second time waited again and still no one came. We ended up leaving with no help.

originalText.text: I would not have this in my apartment without the help of an incredibly knowledgeable well spoken top communicator young man, I forgot his name. He was an electrical engineer graduate. I challenged every detail but he politely led me to the right solution for my space. I am so happy with my Sony tv.  Thank you man, I know you know I am talking about you üôè
